Title: Requires retail worker employers to develop and implement programs to prevent workplace violence
Summary: Updates requirements for retail worker employers when developing and implementing programs to prevent workplace violence; clarifies certain provisions of the retail worker safety act.
LawCode: Amd ยง27-e, Lab L; amd ยง3, Chap of 2024 (as proposed in S.8358-C & A.8947-C)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to requiring retail worker employers to develop and implement programs to prevent workplace violence; and to amend a chapter of the laws of 2024 amending the labor law relating to requiring retail worker employers to develop and implement programs to prevent workplace violence, as proposed in legislative bills numbers S. 8358-C and A. 8947-C, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
